plot: In Turkey, the process of 'Urban Transformation' has been gaining momentum since the 2000's. It started with the excuse of protecting the old settlements and cultural heritage areas.
title: Nerede Yasarsan Yasa
plot_es: In Turkey, the process of 'Urban Transformation' has been gaining momentum since the 2000's. It started with the excuse of protecting the old settlements and cultural heritage areas.
plot_en: In Turkey, the process of 'Urban Transformation' has been gaining momentum since the 2000's. It started with the excuse of protecting the old settlements and cultural heritage areas.
